name: Carousel
tagline: openframeworks app to control a KodakCarousel using ofxDfRobotRelayShield for Arduino
body:
### Project Description. Carousel is an openframeworks application used for a contemporary dance performance. It synchonizes the control of 2 slide projectors and the scene lights with the soundtrack. To control the projectors and the lights are used relays. ### Representations - 03.2013 Barcelona, El Colador - 12.05.2013 Barcelona, Studio P52 ### Media Studio P52 performance teaser:

inefabulosa from Ovidiu Cincheza on Vimeo.

### Project Team Dancer, Choreography: Laila Tafur Coding, Photography: Ovidiu Cincheza Sound: Tony Higuci ### Contact @ovicin
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
